query:
SELECT platform, campaign_name, SUM(spend::numeric) as total_spend, SUM(clicks::numeric) as total_clicks, COUNT(*) as row_count 
FROM ad_performance 
WHERE campaign_name ILIKE '%31DWC%' 
GROUP BY platform, campaign_name 
ORDER BY total_spend DESC 
LIMIT 10;

FROM ad_performance
